prompt:
Nurse: Hi, this is Rachel calling from O'Connor Hospital. I'm an AI on a recorded line. Is this Timoteo Valenzuela?

Patient: Yeah. That's me.

Nurse: Great, Mr. Valenzuela. I'm calling about your upcoming colonoscopy on August 13th at 9:00 AM. Is this a good time to talk?

Patient: Sure.

Nurse: Thank you, Mr. Valenzuela. I hope your day is going well so far. How are you feeling about your upcoming procedure?

Patient: I'm doing okay.

Nurse: I'm glad to hear that, Mr. Valenzuela. It's completely normal to have some feelings about a procedure like this. Is there anything specific you'd like to discuss or any questions you have before we begin?

Patient: Nope. I don't think so.

responses.gpt4:
That's absolutely fine, Mr. Valenzuela. Remember, you're welcome to ask questions at any point during our conversation. 

Looking at your chart, I see that you're getting this colonoscopy due to unexplained and long lasting diarrhea. I realize that this can be a challenging experience to go through. Would you like to talk about how you're coping with this?
responses.our_model: Alright, Mr. Valenzuela. Please remember that you can ask me questions at any time during our conversation. I see on your chart that you're getting this colonoscopy due to unexplained and long-lasting diarrhea. I acknowledge that it can be quite a process to go through this procedure. How are you feeling about it?
